pages.text: $(li)The Raw Moose Ribs is an eatable item that can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/snow_leopard)Snow Leopards$(/l).

$(li)This item may be cooked in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).$(br)$(li)Cooked Moose Ribs satisfies two times more than a Raw Moose Ribs.
